spec.Title: Wireless
spec.Text: Lockitron comes with wifi and Bluetooth build in. This allows keyless entry and allows you to control Lockitron receive notifications from Lockitron anywhere in the world.

spec.Title: Mobile
spec.Text: Locktron runs on any device. This is thanks to our mobile website and apps. Older phones can control Lockitron through text message commands.

spec.Title: Modify
spec.Text: Lockitron works with IFTTT, allowing for endless posibilities. You can also use the Locktron API endpoints.

spec.Title: Efficient
spec.Text: Lockitron is incredibly efficient. It uses 4 AA batteries that last up to 6 months.
